column2: ICAO: WAUB) is an airport in Bintuni. Bintuni is a small town in West Papua
column3: Indonesia and seat of the Teluk Bintuni Regency. The airport resides at an elevation of 13 m (42 ft) above mean sea level and the Airport is managed and operate by UPT Ditjen Hubud. Currently there are no commercial flights operate from this Airport. Address: Jalan Raya Bintuni KM.2 Kel. Bintuni Timur
column4: Kec. Bintuni Kab. Teluk Bintuni Papua Barat 98364 Indonesia Tel: +62 0955-31233
